Leadership in Public Sector

This document discusses the complexities of leadership in the public sector, arguing that it requires a comprehensive approach due to its unique challenges. The author aims to provide a practical framework for understanding good leadership, particularly in government settings.

  • Leadership in Public Safety
  • Organizational Development

  • concept3: The inner core of a good leader
